title: Britney Spears and Sam Asghari like to watch Disney movies like Cinderella at her LA mansion
text:
Britney Spears and Sam Asghari, 25, like to watch Disney movies.

The couple enjoy to spend their quiet nights in watching the Disney films and other movies to pass the time together. 'We watch Disney shows and movies all the time, too,' he told E! News about their ideal night at home at her Thousand Oaks, California mansion.

The 37-year-old star is a big fan of the movie Cinderella, and even released a song with that name in 2001.

PG-13: Britney Spears and Sam Asghari like to watch Disney movies. The couple enjoy to spend their quiet nights in watching the Disney films and other movies to pass the time together; seen in September

a beauty in blue: The first Cinderella song came out in 1957: The story: With a wicked stepmother (Eleanor Audley) and two jealous stepsisters (Rhoda Williams, Lucille Bliss) who keep her enslaved, Cinderella (Ilene Woods) stands no chance of attending the royal ball

Spears has a Disney past: she was one of the Mouseketeers from The Mickey Mouse Club alongside Justin Timberlake, Ryan Gosling and Christina Aguilera.

Meanwhile, Sam previously admitted he can 'absolutely' see marriage in their future as he thinks marriage is the 'whole point' of a relationship.

He said: 'Absolutely. This is something that every couple should do. That's the whole point of a relationship - we are a family. Trust me, if we do ever get married, everybody's going to know.

A new one: Spears will also take in Maleficent with Angelina Jolie and Michelle Pfeiffer seen here in Rome on Monday

'Actually, you might be the first one to know - you never know! ... I have three sisters.

'We've hung out a lot of times. We've been together for three years and my sisters love her, my family loves her.

'My mom lives in another country [but] when she was here, she met her.'

Their love life may play out in the public eye but he believes their relationship is so 'normal' as they inspire and support each other through day-to-day things.

He shared: 'What I love the most about my relationship is the fact that it's so normal.

'It's not glamorous or anything. She inspires me in my work and I can give so much to her by going to the gym, by going to work, by having a balanced life. We can get inspired by each other here and there and really grow with each other.' '

She was a Disney girl: With Christina Aguilera, Justin Timberlake, Ryan Gosling as a Disney Mouseketeers on The All New Mickey Mouse Club in the early 1990s
description: The couple enjoy to spend their quiet nights in watching the Disney films and other movies to pass the time together. 'We watch Disney shows and movies all the time, too,' he told E! News.
